translation: The distinction between these five stages of attaining mind is explained above.
Here, they're said to have attained something other than what was previously accomplished.
It's because they've now attained them.
Commentary on the Kuśa-śāstra, Volume 7

source_sentence: 於大道寺與三弟共讀了
translation: read with my three brothers at the Daodasi temple

source_sentence: 長承四年二月二十二日申時讀了
translation: read at the 22nd hour of the 2nd month of the 4th year of the Eternal Succession

source_sentence: 一遍校勘了　本與新互有得失重可正之
translation: (Skt. koṭī-vikrīḍitā)
